## Overview

This project maps the active demolition permits in Seattle, WA. 

The following data sources are references:

  * Seattle Open Data Portal: [Building Permits](https://data.seattle.gov/Permitting/Building-Permits/76t5-zqzr/data)
  * Seattle Open Data Portal: [Unreinforced Masonry Buildings](https://data.seattle.gov/Permitting/Unreinforced-Masonry-Buildings/54qs-2h7f)
  * King County Assessor's Data: [Assessment Data Download](https://info.kingcounty.gov/assessor/DataDownload/default.aspx) (includes multiple datasets)
